name: Body&spirit
description:
You're a body that acts upon the world, but at the same time you are a spirit that sees more in this world than the eye of your body meets. You're experiencing the duality of body and spirit at the same time. Well, not exactly at the same moment though...

Controls: 

  • [W][A][S][D] - to move, 
  • [space] - detach spirit from body, 
  • [E] - open / close doors

A game made for LT GameJam 2022 by 2 enthusiasts Gedas and Evaldas.

In Vanilla Javascript, html5 and a tad of css.
